events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.
events.description_zh: 在所选内容更改时调用的处理程序。

:children.description: The contents of the collection. Usually the array of `AccordionItem`
:children.description_zh: 集合的内容。通常是 'AccordionItem' 的数组

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
selectionMode.description_zh: 集合中允许的选择类型。

isCompact.description: Whether all Accordion items should be smaller.
isCompact.description_zh: 是否所有手风琴项目都应更小。

isDisabled.description: Whether the Accordion items are disabled.
isDisabled.description_zh: 是否禁用了折叠式项目。

showDivider.description: WWhether to display a divider at the bottom of the each accordion item.
showDivider.description_zh: W是否在每个手风琴项目的底部显示一个分隔线。

hideIndicator.description: Whether the Accordion items indicator is hidden.
hideIndicator.description_zh: 折叠面板项指示器是否处于隐藏状态。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the Accordion items open/close animation is disabled.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用了“手风琴”项的打开/关闭动画。

disableIndicatorAnimation.description: Whether the Accordion items indicator animation is disabled.
disableIndicatorAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用了折叠式项目指示器动画。

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

keepContentMounted.description: Whether the Accordion items content should be always mounted.
keepContentMounted.description_zh: 是否应始终装入手风琴项目内容。

fullWidth.description: Whether the accordion should take up the full width of its parent container.
fullWidth.description_zh: 手风琴是否应占用其父容器的整个宽度。

:motionProps.description: The motion properties of the Accordion.

:disabledKeys.description: The currently disabled keys in the collection (controlled).
:disabledKeys.description_zh: 集合中当前禁用的键（受控）。

:selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
:selectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中当前选定的键（受控）。

:defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
:defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中初始选择的键（不受控制）。
